util.config.props

Class JProps

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.config.props.JProps

  • public class JProps
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides typed access to a Java Properties store.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JProps(java.util.Properties db)
      Creates a new instance to access the given store.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> java.util.Optional<T> get(JPropGetter<T> prop)
      Uses the given getter to look up a property in the underlying Java Properties store.
      java.util.Properties getProps() 
      JProps remove(JPropSetter<?> prop)
      Uses the given setter to remove a property from the underlying Java Properties store.
      JProps removeAll(java.util.stream.Stream<JPropSetter<?>> props)
      Calls remove to delete all the listed properties from the property store.
      JProps set(java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.Properties> prop)
      Lets the specified consumer set a property.
      <T> JProps set(JPropSetter<T> prop, T value)
      Uses the given setter to store a property in the underlying Java Properties store.
      <T> JProps setAll(java.util.stream.Stream<JPropSetter<T>> props, T value)
      Calls set to store the same value in all listed properties.
      JProps setEmpty(JPropSetter<?> prop)
      Uses the given setter to store an empty property in the underlying Java Properties store.
